Package com.foreach.across.modules.web.support

Class MessageCodeSupportingLocalizedTextResolver

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.modules.web.support.MessageCodeSupportingLocalizedTextResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocalizedTextResolver
public final class MessageCodeSupportingLocalizedTextResolver extends Object implements LocalizedTextResolver
Attempts to localize a text snippet. An actual piece of text will simply be returned as is. If the text is a message code token, the message code will be resolved instead, and the optional default text will be used as fallback if the code can't be resolved.

Example supported text formats:

  • Some text : will always return Some text
  • #{message.code} : will return the resolved message code value or the message code itself if unresolvable
  • #{message.code=Some text} : will return the resolved message code value or Some text if unresolvable

A message source is not strictly required, if none is set, message codes will still be replaced by their default values or by just the message code.

Since:
2.1.0
Author:
Arne Vandamme
